name: Caramel Apple Cheesecake
author: Lucky Leaf Fruit Filling
summary: Apple pie filling and melted caramel topping are a sublime variation to cheesecake.
ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can LUCKY LEAF® Premium Apple Fruit Filling
directions: Reserve 3/4 cup of apple filling; set aside
Spoon the remaining filling into the crust
Beat together the cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth
Add the eggs and mix well
Pour this over the LUCKY LEAF Apple Fruit Filling
Bake for 35 minutes, or until the center of the cake is set
Mix the reserved LUCKY LEAF Apple Fruit Filling and caramel topping in a small saucepan and heat for about 1 minute, or until spreadable
Spoon the apple-caramel mixture over the top of the cheesecake and spread evenly
Decorate the edge of the cake with pecan halves and sprinkle with chopped pecans
Refrigerate the cake until ready to serve
